item.title: Building a Custom Domain Events Dispatcher in .NET
item.description: Learn how to build a lightweight, in-process domain events dispatcher in .NET without external dependencies. We'll explore the trade-offs between immediate consistency and coupling while implementing a strongly-typed solution from scratch. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/building-a-custom-domain-events-dispatcher-in-dotnet
